thread.title: Lenovo Unveiled Tab 2 A7-20 for Rs. 5,499
thread.title_full: Lenovo Unveiled Tab 2 A7-20 for Rs. 5,499

title: Lenovo Unveiled Tab 2 A7-20 for Rs. 5,499
text:
Lenovo Unveiled Tab 2 A7-20 for Rs. 5,499 17th, Oct 2015 5:45 PM View: 3 0 
Lenovo India, by expanding its budget line of tablet offering its newly built tablet Tab 2 A7-20 . This tablet will be available at a price tag of Rs.5,499 and the device will go on sale in the country soon.Notably, the Lenovo Tab A7-20 is already available at a discounted price of Rs. 4,999 on the e-commerce website Snapdeal. Lenovo Tab 2 A7-20 is featuring a 7-inch IPS display offering a resolution of 1024*600 pixels. The device is powered by a quad core MediaTek processor. It is based on Android 4.4 Kitkat operating system and is upgradable to Android 5.0 Lollipop. But still there is no information about the update release date. Rohit Midha, Director, Tablet Business Unit, Lenovo India said that, “Lenovo continues to stretch the boundaries of technology innovation with its commitment to user-inspired design, aesthetics and performance. With millennials accessing the Internet and using entertainment mostly on their hand held devices, these range of tablet devices serve as ideal companions.”Lenovo’s Tab 2 A7-20, is aimed at first time tablet buyers. It is 8.69mm thick and weighs 269 grams. The device has the internal storage of 8GB, which is further expandable up to 32GB via MicroSD card slot expansion and coupled with 1GB of DDR3 RAM.The tablet is loaded with 2 megapixel camera at the rear end with LED flash and houses a 0.3 megapixel camera at the front end. The Lenovo Tab 2 A7-20 is Wi-Fi enabled tablet only not allows to feature a SIM support. Apart from Wi-Fi, the device for the connectivity includes USB OTG, and Micro-USB connectivity and is backed by a 3450mAh battery.
